title: Periodic Table
guide:
### Key Elements
Memorize landmarks.

| Sym | Name | No. | Group |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **H** | Hydrogen | 1 | 1 |
| **C** | Carbon | 6 | 14 (Life) |
| **N** | Nitrogen | 7 | 15 (Air) |
| **O** | Oxygen | 8 | 16 (Air) |
| **Au** | Gold | 79 | Metal |
| **He** | Helium | 2 | Noble Gas |
